mapper.insert: insert into db_purchasepaymentdetail (SID, OPER, MONEYACTIONPAY, MANUFACTUREID, PAYMENTID, MONEYNEEDPAY, OPERTIME, MONEYNOTPAY, PAYOPER, MANUFACTURE, PAYNUM, FLAG, PAYTIME, CONTENT) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneyactionpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyneedpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{moneynotpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SID, OPER, MONEYACTIONPAY, MANUFACTUREID, PAYMENTID, MONEYNEEDPAY, OPERTIME, MONEYNOTPAY, PAYOPER, MANUFACTURE, PAYNUM, FLAG, PAYTIME, CONTENT from db_purchasepaymentdetail
